Package com.example.appointment.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
com.example.appointment.controller.Controller
com.example.appointment.controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentAlertsInterface, GetAppointmentsInterface, SQLControllerInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
ViewCustomersController
public class MainController extends Controller implements GetAppointmentsInterface, AppointmentAlertsInterface
A Controller for the main page of the program. It displays the appointment TableView and a variety of options to select different pages. This also includes methods for adding, modifying, and deleting appointments.

    • getCurrentUserAppointmentsList

      public ArrayList<Appointment> getCurrentUserAppointmentsList()
      A method that returns a list of appointments that matches the appointments in the TableView.
      Returns:
      An array list of appointments for the current user.

    • setTableView

      public void setTableView(PreparedStatement stmt) throws SQLConnectionDroppedException
      A method that sets up the TableView object by retrieving appointment objects from the database, placing them into a user object's appointment list, and then displaying that list in the table.
      They are four columns that have lambda expressions in this method
      1. appointmentStartTimeColumn
      2. appointmentEndTimeColumn
      3. startDateColumn
      4. endDateColumn

      The two time columns work by formatting the appointment date objects into the time format HH:mm for each cell in the column. The two date columns work the same way and format each appointment date object to the format of MM-dd-yyyy. These lambda expressions are an easy way to make the time and date information readable and still convertable with the actual appointment object in the database.
      Parameters:
      stmt - A PreparedStatement that is passed in based on what radio button is pressed. This enables the method to only pull select appointments from the database. It also prevents the entire code from being copied three times.
      Throws:
      SQLConnectionDroppedException - If a SQL error occurs that disrupts the connection to the database.

    • getSelectedAppointmentFromTable

      public Appointment getSelectedAppointmentFromTable()
      Gets the selected appointment object from the TableView so that it can be passed into a method to be modified or deleted.
      Returns:
      The selected appointment from the TableView.

    • deleteAppointment

      public void deleteAppointment(ActionEvent event)
      A method that deletes an appointment from the database. It works by getting a selectedAppointment object, and then passing the ID of the appointment into the database where it's deleted. After it's been deleted the table is redrawn so that it shows that the appointment was deleted.
      Parameters:
      event - Passes in that the delete appointment button was pressed.

    • changeAddAppointmentScene

      public void changeAddAppointmentScene(ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      A method that changes the scene to the add appointments page when the add appointment button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Takes in that the Add Appointment button was pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input/output error occurs.

    • changeModifyAppointmentScene

      public void changeModifyAppointmentScene(ActionEvent event)
      A method that changes the scene to the modify appointments page when the modify appointment button is pressed. It will generate an alert message if no appointment has been selected already to be modified.
      Parameters:
      event - Takes in that the Modify Appointment button was pressed.

    • changeViewAll

      public void changeViewAll(ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      A method that creates a query when the appropriate radio button is pressed and then passes it into the setTableView method to load the TableView. This enables the table to display all the appointments, without having to rewrite the entire method multiple times.
      Parameters:
      event - Passes in that the View All radio button was pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input/output error occurs.

    • changeViewByMonth

      public void changeViewByMonth(ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      A method that creates a prepared statement when the appropriate radio button is pressed and then passes it into the setTableView method to load the TableView. This enables the table to display all the appointments within the current month, without having to rewrite the entire method multiple times.
      Parameters:
      event - Passes in that the View By Month radio button was pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input/output error occurs.

    • changeViewByDay

      public void changeViewByDay(ActionEvent event)
      A method that creates a prepared statement when the appropriate radio button is pressed and then passes it into the setTableView method to load the TableView. This enables the table to display all the appointments that are due that day, without having to rewrite the entire method multiple times.
      Parameters:
      event - Passes in that the View By Day radio button was pressed.

    • changeViewByWeek

      public void changeViewByWeek(ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      A method that creates a prepared statement when the appropriate radio button is pressed and then passes it into the setTableView method to load the TableView. This enables the table to display all the appointments within the current week, without having to rewrite the entire method multiple times.
      Parameters:
      event - Passes in that the View By Week radio button was pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input/output error occurs.

    • changeReportsScene

      public void changeReportsScene(ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      A method that changes the scene to the appointment reports page when the Reports button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Takes in that the Reports button was pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input/output error occurs.
      SQLException - If the database error occurs.
